name: Sun's Fury
summary: The target weapon becomes wreathed in a glowing flame.
description: The target weapon becomes wreathed in a glowing flame. The weapon deals an additional 1d4 fire and 1 good damage on a successful Strike. In addition, the flame causes the weapon to glow as bright as a torch. You can Dismiss the spell.
target: 1 weapon without an unholy rune that is unattended or wielded by you or a willing ally
